short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OSINT tool to evaluate the trustworthiness of a company

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: should-i-trust is a information security tool to evaluate Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) signals for a domain. The tool is designed to aggregate and explore data from multiple sources. Requires API keys (free) from: virustotal.com, censys.io, and grayhatwarfare.com.
